definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The shrinkage of the base decreases by the proper dosage water reducing agent.
sentences.chinese: 适宜用量的减水剂降低了基层材料的收缩量。

sentences.english: The general anesthesia therapy dose are few, regains consciousness thoroughly, rapid, the controllability is good.
sentences.chinese: 全麻药用量少，苏醒彻底，迅速，可控性好。

sentences.english: Each year, an estimated 500 billion to 1 trillion plastic bags are consumed worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 每年全球的胶袋使用量估计有5千亿到1万亿个。

sentences.english: The experts also said people should take less than4000mg4,000milligrams of acetaminophen in a single day.
sentences.chinese: 专家们认为一天醋酚氨服用量要少于4000毫克。

sentences.english: There was the significant effect of the different amount of P and K -fertilization on the mustard …
sentences.chinese: 不同磷钾肥施用量对雪里蕻营养品质的效应影响很大。

sentences.english: Concrete is a kind of budling material with is used most.
sentences.chinese: 混凝土是用量最大，用途最广的一种建筑材料。

sentences.english: Sandier soils will require lighter and more frequent fertilizations and slightly heavier yearly rates.
sentences.chinese: 沙性大的土壤需要少量多施，以后逐年加大用量。

sentences.english: Heart myositis and lobar anxiety patient are sensitive to strong heart glucoside, should notice dosage.
sentences.chinese: 心肌炎及肺心病患者对强心甙敏感，应注意用量。

sentences.english: In today's label market, non-drying label is in greatest need.
sentences.chinese: 在目前标签市场上，不干胶标签的用量是最大的。

sentences.english: What is the application rate of Bona Naturale?
sentences.chinese: 博纳自然漆的使用量是多少？

sentences.english: We must cut down on the amount of material we use.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须削减原料使用量。

sentences.english: Higher rates in each range are used with more golf rounds and sandier soils.
sentences.chinese: 球场使用频繁及沙性土壤的情况下都要加大用量。

sentences.english: The type of AED and the dosage needed depends on the type of seizure.
sentences.chinese: 元的类型和用量需要取决于类型的扣押。

sentences.english: If already had armour liver, popularity can increase dosage of essence bleaching pink appropriately.
sentences.chinese: 如已有甲肝流行可适当加大漂粉精用量。

sentences.english: Increased coagulant dosage results in greater sludge yield for ultimate disposal.
sentences.chinese: 增加凝聚剂用量会增大最后处理的污泥量。

definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
delivery mechanism of a medicine (e.g. pill, powder etc)
to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
prescription/cooking recipe/formulation/completing the square (to solve quadratic equation, math.)
to compound (medicines etc)/to prepare (by mixing ingredients)/to concoct
to add or subtract/to increase or decrease/to go up or go down
